name: Aquila Favonia
description: The soul of the Knights of Favonius. Millennia later, it still calls on the winds of swift justice to vanquish all evil — just like the last heroine who wielded it.
refinements:
ATK is increased by **20**
%. Triggers on taking DMG: the soul of the Falcon of the West awakens, holding the banner of the resistance aloft, regenerating HP equal to **100**
% of ATK and dealing **200**
% of ATK as DMG to surrounding opponents. This effect can only occur once every 15s.
